settings.title:
Record

Take your attention back- a passive technology that works for you.
settings.text: Become a better communicator, build stronger relationships, and improve your emotional awareness through effortlessly documenting your conversations.

settings.title:
Remember

Summaries, action items, events, recaps, and notable insights from every moment.
settings.text: Finally, algorithms built for digesting our constant consumption of content. Welcome to the future of Cognitive enhancement technology.

settings.title:
Reflect

Context Aware AI means personalized feedback and actionable steps for anything life throws at you.
settings.text: Tap into your Guides to help you grow personally and professionally. Now you are always connected with your highest self.

settings.title: Join the ABOVE family
settings.custom_text: We’ve built ABOVE with one mission: to help you thrive. Our technology is designed to serve you, not distract you. Whether you're a student, teacher, employee, founder, or lifelong learner, ABOVE is here to help you achieve mental clarity and emotional balance. Think of it as your personal guide to be here, now—free from the stress of what’s next.

settings.title:

settings.title: Go ABOVE. Be the best version of you.
Stay Focused
settings.text:
Break free of the overwhelm of distractions and struggles to stay on task. ABOVE is a tool to rise above the noise and focus on what matters most. This highly effective second brain accesses the algorithm of your creativity, mindset, and emotional well-being.


Now your business is being coached by the culmination of the greatest enterprising minds that have ever existed. Your leadership and communication skills are being mastered through every conversation. Your world is being organized and prioritized effortlessly. The world's intelligence is harnessed for your transformation.

settings.title: Stay Present
settings.text:
ABOVE is the first-ever wearable designed to enhance emotional intelligence. While most wearables track steps or heart rates. ABOVE focuses on your mind and heart to bring clarity to the complex lives we live.


ABOVE Decodes your voice to reveal emotional insights and tracks your emotional journey through mood and energy fluctuations. Don't just master your external world, master your internal one as well.

settings.title: Stay Connected
settings.text:
ABOVE is driven by Reflective AI. Analyzing how you speak, not just the words you choose. Enhancing self-awareness to help you understand and improve your communication in social interactions. Identify conversational patterns, provide feedback on listening skills, or remind you of key details from past interactions.


This isn’t just a data-collecting gadget—it’s a collaborative partner designed to help you become your best self.
What happens when AI truly gets to know you? What happens when it is leveraged for good—to become your guardian angel, your North Star?

settings.title: A New Era of Mindful Wearables. Let ABOVE be your guide.
settings.custom_text: Is it possible for technology to enhance your mental well-being? We believe it can. ABOVE is designed to help you be more present, more aware, and more connected—both to yourself and others. In a world overwhelmed by constant distraction, ABOVE empowers you to rise above the noise and harness your true potential. Your Journey to Higher Intelligence starts today.
